fields.title: Beginner
fields.description: I've never ride on a snowboard before or just from time to time. I want to learn starting from easy steps and low slopes.

fields.title: Intermediate
fields.description: I'm feeling good when riding on easy slopes, I know how to turn, but if it gets steep or narrow then I'm just give up.

fields.title: Advance
fields.description: I'm good on all slopes but I think I stuck and can't progress. I think I still missing something really important.

fields.title: Expert
fields.description: I can ride from top of mountain, I'm feelin like I'm flying when I'm riding downhill. I want to push my limits.
